comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: This appears to be the south-east corner exit from Washington DC's Union Station. All I have to go on is a dark, blurry shot in Google's Streetview, though. I can't confirm the coat of arms above the door, but the curved walls, half-pillars, etc all seem to match.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Wilson reportedly asked, "Where are all the people?" and was told that they were all downtown, watching the national Woman Suffrage Procession: www.loc.gov/loc/lcib/9803/suffrage.html
